parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the post.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. While the post doesn't explicitly mention a specific candidate by name or party affiliation, it strongly implies a connection to Mara Togănel, who is running for office. The post uses "I" and "me" and refers to her as a person who has the trust of 47,000 people from Mureș.  This implicitly identifies her as a candidate.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. The post is a paid Facebook advertisement, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The message is not a private communication but a public appeal to voters in Mureș County.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The primary objective of the post is to encourage voters to go to the polls on election day. While it doesn't explicitly endorse Mara Togănel, the implicit connection and the call to action strongly suggest an electoral objective. The phrasing "Indiferent pe cine alegi, fă-ți vocea auzită" (Regardless of who you choose, make your voice heard) is a subtle but effective way to encourage participation in the election, which benefits the candidate.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. The post lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected of journalistic content. It's a personal appeal from a candidate, not an unbiased news report or analysis.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. While the post expresses personal beliefs ("Cred în Dumnezeu. Cred în mureșeni"), these are used to bolster the call to action, making it primarily an electoral message rather than a personal opinion piece.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>606719112020297</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, while not explicitly mentioning a specific party or candidate's name, strongly promotes Mara Togănel's candidacy through implicit association and a call to action encouraging voters to participate in the election.  The post's paid nature, wide reach, and clear intention to influence voter turnout make it a form of electoral propaganda.  The statement "Nu sunt sluga niciunui sistem. Sunt omul în care peste 47.000 de mureșeni și-au pus încrederea" (I am not a servant of any system. I am the person in whom over 47,000 people from Mureș have placed their trust) is particularly suggestive of a political campaign.  The call to vote, while seemingly neutral, serves to benefit the candidate's chances.  The post's timing, close to election day, further strengthens the argument that it constitutes electoral propaganda.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate> <name>Mara Togănel</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>INDEPENDENT</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Mara Togănel, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea unei postări pe Facebook (ID 606719112020297) după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, care, deși nu menționează explicit un partid sau un candidat, promovează implicit candidatura sa prin asociere și un apel la acțiune care încurajează alegătorii să participe la alegeri.  Postarea plătită, cu o rază largă de acoperire și o intenție clară de a influența participarea alegătorilor, constituie propagandă electorală. Fraza "Nu sunt sluga niciunui sistem. Sunt omul în care peste 47.000 de mureșeni și-au pus încrederea" sugerează o campanie politică. Apelul la vot, deși aparent neutru, servește la beneficiul candidatului. Cronologia postării, apropiată de ziua alegerilor, întărește argumentul că aceasta constituie propagandă electorală.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
